info.name: ProbeStack Admin Dashboard API Copy 2
info.description: Complete API collection for ProbeStack Admin Dashboard including Authentication, Organization Management, User Management, Auth0 Integration, and more.

item.name: Auth0 Callback - Exchange Code for Tokens

request.description: Exchange Auth0 authorization code for access tokens. Also syncs user and roles to database.

response.name: Success

originalRequest.description: Exchange Auth0 authorization code for access tokens. Also syncs user and roles to database.

response.body:
{
  "success": true,
  "access_token": "eyJhbGciOiJkaXIiLCJlbmMiOiJBMjU2R0NNIn0...",
  "id_token": "eyJhbGciOiJSUzI1NiIsInR5cCI6IkpXVCJ9...",
  "token_type": "Bearer",
  "expires_in": 86400,
  "scope": "openid profile email",
  "user": {
    "email": "user@acme.com",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "nickname": "john",
    "picture": "https://s.gravatar.com/avatar/...",
    "email_verified": true
  },
  "organization": {
    "id": "org_1",
    "name": "Acme Corporation",
    "external_org_id": "ACME"
  },
  "login_record_id": "abc-123",
  "synced_user": {
    "id": "user-123",
    "email": "user@acme.com",
    "name": "John Doe",
    "role": "User"
  },
  "synced_roles": [{"id": "role-123", "name": "User"}],
  "auth0_roles": ["User", "Developer"]
}
